content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. I am indeed a greedy and petty landlord, so I will do everything in my power to get the highest price for this apartment. Let's start with a high price like 1500 Euros per month. Remember, I don't want to tell you the facts about the apartment or myself.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a very high price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment. I'm a student and I'm on a tight budget. I'm also smart and not easily tricked, so I will negotiate with you to get the best price possible. How about we start with 700 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your negotiating skills, but as a greedy landlord, I'm not going to accept your offer. Let's meet somewhere in the middle, say 1200 Euros per month. Remember, I'm not here to play fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
